The Tooth Fairy

Whiten Teeth FCP Home Kit for Sensitive Teeth with Jumbo-Sized Tube of Whitening Gel, Soft Brush Applicator, Tooth Mousse, Customizable Trays, and Instructions

C$29
deal over
  • 82%
    savings
  • 150
    purchased
  • -- : -- : --
    remaining
  • share:

orWant it for free? Buy first, then share a special link. If three friends buy, yours is free!

  • description
  • fine print

You remember the excitement of losing a tooth, putting it under your pillow, and waiting for the Tooth Fairy to leave you something shiny. Since then, your teeth have taken a lot of wear and tear, and have even gotten a tad sensitive. Consider today's deal from The Tooth Fairy the something shiny you've been waiting for under your pillow: pay $29 for a Whiten Teeth FCP Home Kit (a $160 value) that includes a jumbo-sized tube of dental grade 12% hydrogen peroxide teeth-whitening gel, a soft brush applicator, tooth mousse, customizable upper and lower mouth trays, and detailed application instructions all good for ten to twelve treatments. The tooth mousse is what makes this kit perfect for delicate dents -- made with flouride, calcium, and potassium nitrate, this product can prevent sensitivity, build a protective layer, and deliver minerals to the surface of your teeth -- not even Her Fairiness is that considerate.

Want more? Check out The Tooth Fairy on Facebook.

Limit 1 per person, additional as gifts • Entire value must be used in a single visit • Shipping is included within Canada; ships within approximately 1-2 weeks • For inquiries by phone: 416-840-7246 • Other conditions apply

PAID AND PROMOTIONAL VALUES EXPIRES ON December 26, 2012
